About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I’m a graduate of Al Azhar university – Faculty of commerce, before graduation, I Joined Egypt Computer company as a technical support (IT) but I didn’t find my passion in that position so I decided to start a new career in a field where my real passion is, I resigned from it and started a 6 months to study full stack web development ,then I Joined to True Tech company , then I got an internship as a full stack web developer at webbing stone , among all that, I took online courses , watched and learned from so many educational videos on HTML, CSS, Sass, JS, J Query ,Ajax, PHP Laravel, Vue JS APIs MySQL, SQL, MongoDB, Firebase
